title: Family Problem thingy
body: Hi guys, my parents HATE it when I play League of Legends. But we decided to make a deal that If I can do the dishes, I can play all day long. Any tips on doing a fast dishes? PLEASE?

replies.body: Just break them. No more dishes to use also equal no more dishes to wash.
Ha, even if it takes you 1 hour to do the dishes and clean the house, its worth, for the whole day afterwards to play league.
Buy paper plates and plastic cutlery, throw in bin when done. Doesn't get much faster than that
